description: This file is a React-like component (using Qwik framework) that handles routing for the index or root path. It performs a client-side redirect to the '/notes' page upon mount and provides fallback UI for non-JavaScript clients.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main component function that returns JSX structure for the index route, handling redirection and UI.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Hook used to run side effects when the component is visible, here to perform client-side redirect.
